artifacts.summary: Implementation blocked - fundamental architecture limitation in DovetailingChain's two-chain approach prevents cross-sign propagation proofs
Detailed analysis of why Phase 1 is blocked and alternative approaches

partial_progress.details: Phase 1 cannot be completed: DovetailingChain's two-chain architecture fundamentally cannot prove cross-sign propagation. Backward chain extends HContent (H formulas), forward chain extends GContent (G formulas). No cross-chain mechanism exists. Plan v3 needs revision to use UnifiedChain or RecursiveSeed approach.
partial_progress.blocking_issue: Architecture limitation: GContent != HContent, so G formulas in backward chain cannot propagate via HContent to forward chain

completion_data.completion_summary: Plan v3 Phase 1 is fundamentally blocked. Analysis shows DovetailingChain's two-chain architecture (forward=GContent, backward=HContent) cannot support cross-sign G/H propagation. The plan's approach incorrectly assumed G(G phi) puts G phi in HContent; it actually puts it in GContent. Plan revision needed to use UnifiedChain (combined seeds) or RecursiveSeed (pre-placed witnesses) approach.

next_steps: Revise plan v3 to use UnifiedChain approach (combines GContent+HContent in seeds) or RecursiveSeed approach (pre-places temporal witnesses). Alternatively, consider scope-restricted truth lemma restructuring for eval-only temporal coherence.
